main.littleDescription: Manage your account settings and preferences

notificationTab.mainHint: Choose what emails you'd like to be sent
notificationTab.offerSubtitle: You will be notified when an offer changes status
notificationTab.chatSubtitle: You will be notified when you have any new messages in chat
notificationTab.similarOffersSubtitle: You will be notified when someone creates a new similar offer
notificationTab.emailSubtitle: Turn on email notification to get updates through email

passwordSecurityTab.title: Password & Security
passwordSecurityTab.deactivateDescription: If you deactivate your account it will be hidden on this site. You can activate your account anytime.
